PTC-BR stands for Publicly Trusted Certificates – Baseline Requirements. It is one of the “policies” within the ETSI TS 102042 v2.4.1 standard and means that BRG is included in the audit. Same applies to “EV-CP” (EV-certificates). ... ETSI standard, page 13
PTC-BR = BR audit criteria
